类 SocialNetwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • SocialNetwork

  • public class SocialNetwork
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents a social network as a list of persons (friends or contacts)
    作者:
    CS1027

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      SocialNetwork()
      Constructor creates person array of default size
      SocialNetwork(int max)
      Constructor creates person array of specified size

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void add(java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName, java.lang.String email)
      add method adds a person to the list
      void clearFriends()
      clearFriends method is a method that remove all friends from the list
      int getNumFriends()
      getNumFriends method is a getter method that gets the number of friend in the friend list
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      test harness
      boolean remove(java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName)
      remove method removes a specified friend from the list
      java.lang.String toString()
      toString method returns a string representation of all persons in the list

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • SocialNetwork

        public SocialNetwork()
        Constructor creates person array of default size

      • SocialNetwork

        public SocialNetwork(int max)
        Constructor creates person array of specified size
        参数:
        max - maximum size of array

    • 方法详细资料

      • add

        public void add(java.lang.String firstName,
       java.lang.String lastName,
       java.lang.String email)
        add method adds a person to the list
        参数:
        firstName - first name
        lastName - last name
        email - email address

      • remove

        public boolean remove(java.lang.String firstName,
             java.lang.String lastName)
        remove method removes a specified friend from the list
        参数:
        firstName - first name of person to be removed
        lastName - last name of person to be removed
        返回:
        true if friend was removed successfully, false otherwise

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        toString method returns a string representation of all persons in the list
        覆盖:
        toString 在类中 java.lang.Object
        返回:
        first name and last name, email address of each person

      • getNumFriends

        public int getNumFriends()
        getNumFriends method is a getter method that gets the number of friend in the friend list
        返回:
        the number of friends

      • clearFriends

        public void clearFriends()
        clearFriends method is a method that remove all friends from the list

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        test harness
